content:
Also, you'll find some daily necessities from Loomi Co. in the box inside the tent.
Feel free to open it and use them as you need.

Then please take your time and
enjoy it at your own pace!
I'll go get some rest now

Let's take a quick nap in bed.
When afternoon comes,
we'll start building our life properly.

Alright!
Just a moment...
Here, take this.

Left-click to <color=#38b6c5>open chests</color>,
To use items, simply left-click on them,
To rest on a bed, just <color=#38b6c5>press [Interact]</color> when next to it.

When you want to take a break,
Let me know before heading back to your tent.
I have something for you later.

This is a camping bed,
Please <color=#38b6c5>in the tent</color>,
<color=#38b6c5>use</color> it from your <color=#38b6c5>Backpack</color> with a left click.

Everyone's still chatting over tea.
If <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color> feels tired, 
you can <color=#97c344>head back to the tent for some rest</color>!
